summary: A comprehensive test suite for the text‑to‑video synthesis pipelines, verifying core generation, zero‑shot capabilities, SDXL integration, video‑to‑video transformation, performance optimizations (attention slicing, batch inference), deterministic behavior, GPU execution, and model saving/loading.
business_intent: Ensure the reliability, efficiency, and correctness of AI‑driven video generation services before release, supporting high‑quality media creation and seamless integration into production workflows.
